        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Animal vocabulary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierwortschatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vocabulaire animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vocabulário animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vocabolario animale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωικό λεξιλόγιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vocabulario animal</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simple matching activity for 4th graders involving animal related vocabulary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine einfache zusammenpassende Aktivität für die
4. Sortierer, die Tier mit einbeziehen, stand Wortschatz in 
Verbindung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité assortie simple pour les 4èmes 
niveleuses impliquant l'animal a associé le vocabulaire</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade combinando simples para os 4ns 
graduadores que envolvem o animal relacionou o vocabulário</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività di corrispondenza semplice per i 
quarti selezionatori che coinvolgono l'animale ha collegato il 
vocabolario</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια απλή ταιριάζοντας με δραστηριότητα για τα 4$α 
γκρέιντερ που περιλαμβάνει σχετικό με το το ζώο λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad que correspondía con simple para 
los 4tos graduadores que implicaban el animal relacionó vocabulario</string>
          </description>
